cofh.api.fluid

Interface ITankContainerBucketable


  • public interface ITankContainerBucketable
    Extends the IFluidHandler interface to allow manual draining/filling via buckets.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allowBucketDrain(ItemStack stack)
      Called to determine if the IFluidHandler should be drained by buckets.
      boolean allowBucketFill(ItemStack stack)
      Called to determine if the IFluidHandler should be filled by buckets.

    • Method Detail

      • allowBucketFill

        boolean allowBucketFill(ItemStack stack)
        Called to determine if the IFluidHandler should be filled by buckets.
        Parameters:
        stack - The ItemStack being used to fill the IFluidHandler
        Returns:
        True if the IFluidHandler is allowed to be filled with stack

      • allowBucketDrain

        boolean allowBucketDrain(ItemStack stack)
        Called to determine if the IFluidHandler should be drained by buckets.
        Parameters:
        stack - The ItemStack being used to drain the IFluidHandler
        Returns:
        True if the IFluidHandler is allowed to be drained with stack
